rule.name: QueryInFlowLoop
rule.message: SOQL and DML Operations shouldn't be done inside of Flow loops.
rule.description: SOQL and DML Operations shouldn't be done inside of Flow loops.

rule.name: SetBypassFlow
rule.message: A bypass should be set in autolaunched or record-triggered flow.
rule.description: A bypass should be set in autolaunched or record-triggered flow.

rule.name: NoDefaultConnector
rule.message: Lookups, creates, deletes, updates or decisions should have a default connector.
rule.description: Lookups, creates, deletes, updates, decisions or actions should have a default connector.

rule.name: HardcodeIdFlow
rule.message: If it is an Id, do not hardcode it.
rule.description: If it is an Id, do not hardcode it.

rule.name: MissingFaultConnector
rule.message: Add a fault connector to handle potential errors.
rule.description: Important Flow elements should have fault paths to gracefully handle errors.

rule.name: NoSubflowsUsed
rule.message: Consider modularizing large flows using Subflows.
rule.description: Subflows improve reusability and modularity of logic.

rule.name: NoEntryConditions
rule.message: Record-triggered Flow has no entry conditions. Add filters to limit triggers.
rule.description: Flows without entry conditions may be inefficient and cause unnecessary executions.
